law.catch_line: Individuals required to file statements of financial interests.
law.text:
The following individuals shall file a sworn statement of financial interests with the commission:
Members of the General Assembly;
All candidates and nominees for election to the General Assembly; and
Major management personnel in the legislative branch of state government, including the director, deputy directors, and assistant directors of the Legislative Research Commission.
law.history: Created 1993 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 18, effective September 16, 1993.
